commands.name: echo
commands.desc: Displays messages or turns command echoing on/off.
commands.preview: Hello World

commands.name: help
commands.desc: Provides help information for Windows commands.
commands.preview:
For more information on a specific command, type HELP command-name
ASSOC    Displays or modifies file extension associations.
ATTRIB   Displays or changes file attributes.
BREAK    Sets or clears extended CTRL+C checking.
CD       Displays the name of or changes the current directory.
CLS      Clears the screen.
COPY     Copies one or more files to another location.
DATE     Displays or sets the date.
DEL      Deletes one or more files.

commands.name: dir
commands.desc: Displays a list of files and subdirectories.

commands.name: if
commands.preview:
C:\>if exist log.txt echo Found
Found

commands.name: for
commands.preview:
C:\>for %f in (*.txt) do echo %f

C:\>echo note.txt
note.txt

C:\>echo list.txt
list.txt
commands.notes: Use %%v in batch files, %v in CMD.

commands.name: netsh winsock reset
commands.desc: Assists in fixing network connectivity issues by clearing the Winsock Catalog.

commands.name: chkdsk
commands.desc: Checks and repairs hard drive errors.
commands.preview:
The type of the file system is NTFS.
Volume label is Windows.

File verification completed.

  300000 index entries processed.
Index verification completed.
commands.notes: Requires a restart if used on the C: drive.

commands.name: net stop bits
commands.desc: Stops the Background Intelligent Transfer Service. Useful for troubleshooting stuck updates.
commands.preview:
The Background Intelligent Transfer Service service is stopping.
The Background Intelligent Transfer Service service was stopped successfully.

commands.name: net stop wuauserv
commands.desc: Stops the Windows Update service. Useful for restarting the update process.
commands.preview:
The Windows Update service is stopping.
The Windows Update service was stopped successfully.

commands.name: ipconfig /flushdns
commands.desc: Clears the DNS resolver cache to fix browsing issues.
commands.preview:
Windows IP Configuration

Successfully flushed the DNS Resolver Cache.
